metadata.title: CVE-2021-20314 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Stack buffer overflow in libspf2 versions below 1.2.11 when processingcertain SPF macros can lead to Denial of service and potentially codeexecution via malicious crafted SPF explanation messages.

criterions.comment: libspf2: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
